website_summaries.verdict: A good all-rounder that stands out with its ability to film 60fps 4K video.
pros: This easy-to-fly drone is a good option for videos or photos
Comes with 8 propellors, a carrying case, and a 16GB SD card
cons: Cracks may develop in the frame

customer_reviews.title: Took off and never returned  *UPDATED*
customer_reviews.text: After 5 minutes of practicing lift and land, the Drone took off and disappeared. It would not respond to return home, and it has been over three hours now, the transmitting has since expired and we can't find it. The number 1 reason I purchased this was for the return home feature. Not so Merry Christmas to us. THIS COMPANY HAS AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE After many attempts to locate the Drone, the company replaced it with a White Drone at no extra charge. We have not had a problem at all with the replacement, and appreciated them taking the time to work through the problem with us, and to replace the missing drone.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Russell

customer_reviews.title: So far, I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am really loving this drone. It is my first, but it is pretty easy to get it up and running. I will attach a video I made with it. I don't have a TF card yet, so it was recorded on my iPhone using the WiFi connection. It is just intended to be a scenic 360 degree view. FOLLOWUP: I too have ran into a couple of obstacles with little to no damage to the drone. Both times it was because I tried to fly before the GPS satellites were acquired. If you try to take off before that happens, the drone flies off wildly!
customer_reviews.author: DCrawford

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend Potensic for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Positively the best drone for inexperienced pilots. Learning to fly is elementary and no matter who takes the controls it is simple and easy. The GPS return home features keeps the D80 safe, secure and most of all worry free.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: 100%POTENSIC THE BADASS BUG!
customer_reviews.text: DAMN EVERYBODY!This is the drone 2 own.Its fast,sleek,stealthy,smart and for all the glorious features with the cheap price tag you would be a fool not 2 HAVE this Beautiful Machine following you wherever ya wanna go.100% Perfect score.Iam an Extreme Drone Hobbiest and I can honestly say I've flown way more expensive drones and was BORED OUTA MY MIND!!Potensic is perfect for beginners to the advanced flyers.There is absolutely nothing I can say negatively about this Drone.under 3 bills and they throw in travel box 4 free.SHIT,what are youwaiting 4?If your a fan of the bugs series you are about 2 b blown outa the sky that's if ya can keep up!100%must OWN!POTENSIC got this Drone RIGHT!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Defective? Upsetting
customer_reviews.text: Read the instructions and watched YouTube videos. Started the drone up put it in hover mode went up 4-5 ft and on its own it flew off wildly why?
customer_reviews.author: Julie Vakula

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome drone. It came exactly with the description. A box with everything you needed inside. You have to read the instructions initially to setup the drone before you can start playing with it. Once its setup, the drone is easy to fly and the RTH function works well. The only reason why its not a five star is that the batter last only 10-12 mins before the controls start indicating battery low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery only lasts 12 minutes! Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Would NOT recommend buying this particular drone. The battery won't stay charged but about 12 minutes. Then it takes at least 5-6 hours to recharge the battery for the 12 minutes of use. The drone flies well, but it does us no good at all for just 12 minutes of flying time. Comes in a nice case. That's the only good thing about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Drone
customer_reviews.text: I love the D80 drone. It is easy to fly and has many features of much more expensive drones. I only gave it four stars because of the the battery. It takes about 5 hours to charge for about an 18 minute flight. I ordered 2 batteries with my drone and one of the batteries would take over 12 hours to charge. I got in touch with Potensic support and they replaced the battery free of charge. Good drone and good support.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mounts

customer_reviews.title: Drone malfunctioned
customer_reviews.text: Flew the drone one time before it malfunctioned and was lost. I am waiting to hear back from Potensic support. Very frustrated as this was an expensive product that I lost due to a malfunction to the drone.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Consider possibly not purchasing this product I’ve noted other customers with the same problem
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to set up very happy with the directions I did find additional information on YouTube. My main problem is the drone flew away uncontrollable. On the third attempt I was not able to bring it back some type of software malfunction this is the third drone I purchase from Amazon. I am extremely familiar with drone operation being a private pilotHas anyone had this problem with flyaway non-control very Unhappy waste of hard earned money. Consider possibly not purchasing this product I’ve noted other customers with the same problem
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Lost it on 3rd flight
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where the drone ended up, but the "come to home" function did not work. I have posted fliers in hopes it will be returned, but it definitely acted like it was being controlled from somewhere else. I saw it land, but no distance was on the remote. Would NOT purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Lazzell

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I am completely obsessed with this drone. I bought it as a birthday present from my brother and I am using it more than he is! It is very easy to assemble and very user friendly. I learned how to drive it on 10 min. A GIANT plus about his specific drone is the box it comes with. You can take it anywhere and never have to worry about it being damaged. It is an excellent carry suitcase. The 1080P Camera is incredible. Very clear images. The follow me function is sooo cool!
customer_reviews.author: Tati

customer_reviews.title: Delicate in some ways, hardy in others
customer_reviews.text: Dislikes- Touchy remote, hairtrigger controls. Confusion in the app- had to do a ton of outside research to figure the control screen on my phone/set up/troubleshooting. The wind takes this thing far far away, and the controls are null when there is a little wind. We have lost it a ton so far. I got a micro sd card for it, and no footage recorded to the card! It has recorded to the app in other flights with no card inserted. Likes- we have crashed this little drone every time we've taken this out to fly and it is still ticking. Has a bunch of cool features.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gatewood

customer_reviews.title: You may lose your drone!
customer_reviews.text: My drone just flew away on its own. Could not find it. I followed all procedures and had already logged many hours of flight time. It's a good cheap drone, just no replacement warranty. FYI the drone was licensed as well as the operator.
customer_reviews.author: 4runnerchevy

customer_reviews.title: Solid Drone
customer_reviews.text: This is a good drone for the price range. It flies well and is relatively easy to control. It has some nice features altitude hold and return to home, but not everything you may expect such as follow or route planning. The camera is the best I've seen in this price pt. Battery does last longer than most ~15min. It can go very high and very fast but it is not a racing drone. Customer service is really good from Protensic, they still reach out to me a year later for support and complimentary gear (+1 to review).
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Bell

customer_reviews.title: My fourth potensic drone
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth potensic drone I've had and none of them lasted over a month this one lasted 20 days i havent crashed it and took good care of I didnt fly it for the first 5 days.i kept trying potensic because I thaught i would eventually get a good product my friend baught a diffe rent brand when I got my first potensic he still flying the same one.i for the price i think they could do a little better .
customer_reviews.author: Michal vickers

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this to review the product for the second time. I was sent a replacement drone because of issue with my original drone. The replacement drone is worse than the first. I’ve been flying drones for years and this is the worst. Once the drone is in the air you are supposed to be able to control the backward and forward drift but no matter which way you push on the right stick the drone drifts backwards and crashes. I gave them a second shot and was disappointed again. DO NOT BUY POTENSIC DRONES! Nothing but issues.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Drone
customer_reviews.text: I had a technical issue initially with the first drone but luckily the seller was kind enough to send me a replacement. Now everything works perfectly and I have zero complaints. To the quite contrary, this is by far the best drone I've owned and I really enjoy flying it. I love the fact that it stays within range and that it's able to maintain its position with minimum drifting while on GPS mode.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Barringer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: The potensic d80 is an amazing drone. Customer service is truly outstanding. My only problem with the drone is the Google app. There are bugs that still need to be worked out. I could not get remote battery indicator or satillite indicator to register on the phone app. My phone is a motor G5 plus with Android 8.0.0 Now I guess I'll just have to wait it out until the developers solve this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The drone has strong power, easy to control, and fly fast! The drone comes with a beautiful carrying case which is super light! It includes only one battery so I probably would buy some extra batteries for my drone. There are 4 extra propellers included. After I connected the camera on my phone, I was a little disappointed because the video quality not as I expected; however, soon after I figure out that the 2K FHD camera requires a TF card which is not included. Besides that, it's a really nice drone, and I'm satisfied with it. Good choice if you don't want to buy an expensive drone!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for beginners, but camera does not pan so that you can look down (no gimbal)
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for beginners, but camera does not pan so that you can look down (no gimbal). I wanted it for great shots and roof inspections. Also, camera doesn’t zoom and since there is no gimbal for pan action, video recording can be bumpy. I’m switching to DJI Mavic 2 zoom with 3 axis gimbal. Instructions were hard to understand and controls took some getting used to. Have to motion calibrate each flight which is annoying. Long charging time of 5 hours. Flight time is short at about 16.5 minutes. Hard case is nice. But I’m willing to spend more for better camera options.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly, good quality recordings on iPhone X - integrated GPS helpful for recovery
customer_reviews.text: I was positively surprised by the flight stability (even in windy conditions at 10,500 feet) and the video quality delivered to my iPhone. This is a great drone for the price and the resulting videos are fun to watch and are a great marketing tool for renting or selling properties. The "GPS Return Home" function works pretty accurately (+- 5 feet in our setup), but - of course - does not see trees or other obstacles on its way back - so I would recommend using it in open environments.
customer_reviews.author: Till R.

customer_reviews.title: It is just what I want, very happy
customer_reviews.text: I did quite much research for getting a drone. After reading many reviews and watching many videos, I finally decided to go Potensic D80 drone. I was very happy I made a good choice as it performs so well, beyond my expectation. You can control it quite accurately and the GPS guided fly is just amazing. The photo and video it takes are in high quality. The fly range and battery time are just as advertised if not better. In short, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wood

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I want to change the shipping address for my order. I had a brother, is Faisal Apriliansyah on his birthday I wanted to give him a surprise The Potensic GPS FPV RC Drone, D80 with 1080P Camera Live Video and GPS Return Home, Strong Brushless Motors, 25 mph High Speed 5.0GHz Wi-Fi Gyro Quadcopter with Compact Suitcase If you can, please change the delivery address to the address of my brother The address is : Name : Faisal Apriliansyah Address 1 : Dsn Salam RT. 002, RW 002 Address 2 : Dsn Salam RT. 002, RW 002 City: Blitar Zip code : 66181 Country : indonesia Phone : 081545583452
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Nice quad. Nice case
customer_reviews.text: I have flown this drone quite a few times now and ETA flies great. It has The shape and the flight characteristics of the Bugs 2se. I do not recommend brushless quad copters for any beginners because they could injure themselves with high speed motors. That being said I think this is a great for an intermediate to advanced pilot. I love the case and the way It responds to stick commands. WIFI FPV good out to about 150 meters in my flights.
customer_reviews.author: B. G.

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Was good until it took off and didn’t come back !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great drone so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm happy with my purchase. Haven't had a lot of time to take it out yet, but I do like what I see. I purchased this Drone after my experience with their other products. Seems like Potensic adds some features normally seen in higher up drones. I have zero complaints so far with Potensic. They respond quickly to make sure you are happy with the product. If I have issues, I'm confident that they will respond quickly and help resolve any issues.
customer_reviews.author: iucrew

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for travel mostly, and haven't taken it out on a trip yet, but in getting used to flying it around the yard it's definitely worth the price. The picture quality is great for personal photos, and it really is easy to fly with some practice. The battery life could be longer, but it's on par with most other drones of its size and cost. 5 stars for materials because although it's all plastic and might feel cheaply made before using it, I've crashed quite a few times already with no issues. Setup is simple and after learning that process, only takes about 15 seconds each separate time you fly or swap the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Hookman

customer_reviews.title: Carry case is nice...easy flight for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third drone I’ve purchased And I love it! The case is really nice...but I think an extra inch of space would be useful as propellers are right against the exterior edges. These drones are great for beginners. Not difficult to control. No need to spend hundreds of dollars on fancy drones as you will be very satisfied with the precision controls and ease of piloting.
customer_reviews.author: Tankster2345

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: This drone is one of the funniest things I've ever bought. I've never flown one before, after 2 weeks I fell like an expert, lol. But easy to learn to fly, very intuitive. Very solid construction, and all the features work great, better than expected actually! The follow me, point of intrest, and waypoint flight all work fine. The three "return to home" modes work flawless. And trust me on this, that mode has saved my a$$, and it will save yours too. But overall a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus S.

customer_reviews.title: Best drone for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t want to write a review till I used it. My only experience with drones is the drone X and drone X clone ( which is way better than drone X ). If you never used a drone but have seen videos and thought wow that’s cool , this is the drone for you. The small ones without gps drift and video signal sucks. Simply put this is easy to use and fun as F@ck
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features. Easy to learn.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone with the intention of taking photos and video out at the lake from my boat. I've only been able to use it once so far but I have been impressed with it. The return home function was important to me being that I am very new to the world of drones. It has a lot of features that I'm not familiar with now but it seems easy enough to navigate that it should be fairly easy to learn to operate with enough time and practice. The company is very interactive in correspondence so I don't foresee any issues in the future. For the price certainly worth it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: You purchase something it should work. But it’s all well!!
customer_reviews.text: Controller would not connect to the drone. Tried multiple times very disappointed. You buy some you think it should work. UPDATE Potensic stepped right up and took care of everything. I still really enjoy flying this drone today.Thank You Potensic. They have a customer for life. Sorry I’m bad for not updating this review sooner.
customer_reviews.author: SJK 57

customer_reviews.title: very nice quality drone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone for my husband. He has never had a drone before, but has really been interested in them and wanted one with a high quality camera. It took a little getting used to because this drones controls are very sensitive, but that is a good quality, just not necessarily easy for beginners! He loves the drone, and it takes excellent quality videos! Also love the carrying case :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Can't Say Enough About This Drone...
customer_reviews.text: .... In fact, it is the second one I have purchased. So easy to use, so easy to fly and shoot video. Sure, the instructions could be better, what with more detailed "HOW-TO" videos, etc., but for the most part this is a superb drone that is incredibly affordable. Thanks to Potensic for making a really cool device.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Jofree

customer_reviews.title: Battery
customer_reviews.text: This drone is great, it took us a while to really understand it since this was the first one for us. We purchased two batteries to make sure we had enough power while video our ranch property. Unfortunately the battery time does not last very long, example is after ten minutes it starts to beep. It takes too long to charge while we are using the other one. I am hoping to search for a faster charger or a longer battery supply. Other than that it's great, pictures and videos are great. We are still working on getting better at using it.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Chorba

customer_reviews.title: Perfessional and Easy to control
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone last month. it comes with nice elegant box. It;s good size drone and easy to take anywhere with this nice protection box. the reason why i buy it is i need one to do some flat roof inspection. i used it couple times since i got it. it works very well, very easy to control. the picture comeout very clean and you can see the detials of the roof. very perfessional.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyleonardo

customer_reviews.title: Very fun to use and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm still getting a hang of flying it, but it's been a lot of fun. It's a very good quality drone and I'm happy with the pictures we get from it. I've only used it in cold weather 32-45 degrees F, but the battery has good life still. Probably about 15min in the cold, when battery life decreases as one would expect. This was bought for me as a gift, but I'd definitely choose this drone for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Zadoka

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding control, especially in windy conditions!
customer_reviews.text: Am using this drone to take aerial photos of properties. However one major problem is that when the RTH button is pressed the drone tends to fly straight up to an altitude of anywhere from 60-80 feet, Do not understand this, so you have to immediately re-command the drone. One other problem was getting the app to connect to the camera due to the 5g capability of the aircraft. Other than that, Very fun to fly and handles very well, takes awesome photos and excellent videos.
customer_reviews.author: len farmer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve flown a couple of drones before—both my sons have very small ones—but never anything like this baby. Out of the box it’s an amazing looking machine. It’s sleek and expensive looking. The build quality of the drone is a lot better than I expected. I expected a light and plastic drone, but this is not the case. A wonderful bonus is the carrying case that’s included. Overall the obstacle avoidance that it does have is much better than most other drones. I was incredibly impressed with how stable the drone was. It was able to lock onto its location via GPS and even under high wins it held steady with no problem. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: And love

customer_reviews.title: Perfect drone for photos!
customer_reviews.text: I've never flown a drone before, and this one has a great many features that make it very accessible for a beginner. The Return to Home button, which tells the drone to automatically return to where the remote is, makes sure that you can never "lose" it. The fact that the Drone automatically comes "home" in the event that the remote dies or breaks is also very reassuring. Not to mention it takes stellar pictures from angles we mere humans could never dream of seeing without the magic of flight.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: One of the best drone under $250
customer_reviews.text: This is a birthdays gift for my husband. He has been looking for a drone for awhile. We looked at so many different ones but either they are too expensive, has no return home function, crappy photo quality, very short battery life, or hard for a drone newbie to control, until we found this one. This drone has everything that we are looking for yet in our price range, plus it comes with a case that makes it very easy to carry everywhere. I wouldn’t expect this to have super long range or battery, or 4K resolution but this will probably be one of the best drone for $200!
customer_reviews.author: Yannie

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The company stands behind their product. They sent me a new motor. I had to solder it in place myself when the motor malfunctioned. I guess they won't cover that if you don't know how to do it yourself. I love the GPS on it.
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: What a great drone. I have had less expensive ones, let’s face it cheaper ones. This is nice. It flys beautifully. The functions are great. It takes a little trial and error with a few things to figure all the options out. The directions could be more in-depth and clear, but you figure it out. The video is clear, it skips from time to time. Over all very happy with, love to fly it.
customer_reviews.author: g man

customer_reviews.title: By This
customer_reviews.text: This drone is the perfect tool for a intermediate drone operator, moving on too something more advanced and professional. I’ve had it for about a year and still workers as knew, also thought me how to fly with out headless mode and record videos better, when I got that down I moved on to a more professional drones. The D80 is the perfect drone to get or to gift . It does everything advertised is almost impossible to loose it using the GPS.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner drone for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have friends who've spent a lot of money just to CRASH their first drone. I knew I'd be one of them, so I decided to spend a little less and get this drone. I must admit I was very pleasantly surprised with the high quality and ease of setting it up. I'm still learning but I'm very please with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J. Rubas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly.....
customer_reviews.text: For my first drone, it was a little confusing to do the compass calibration, but once I was able to successfully complete that I was able to fly my first flight. Much quieter than I expected and works awesome. Easy to fly, pay attention to the control set up. Top notch with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Josh P

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: This one would not work with ipad, or android applications. Tried for two weeks to contact company with no response from them. Drone flew beautifully, but what good is that if you can't take photos or video. Had to return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great drone.
customer_reviews.text: This drone has a lot of features and they are all very reliable. It's made well too. I accidentally forgot to lock the battery in and it came loose during flight and fell 100+meters and only bent one prop. I would recommend as a first drone or as an upgrade to a lesser drone.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: X-drone app doesn't work and  not customer support.
customer_reviews.text: I like the drone and connects with the controller but the only problem is the X-drone app, it doesn't work on Samsung S9 "I am sorry , the program is abnormal and is going to quit", I tried an old phone HTC one and the app is not compatible.. So far I haven't had any luck to get customer support info.. one last try with another phone tomorrow and return it.. if the app doesn't work the drone is a waste of money as many nice features can not be accessed and so the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Timoteo Torres

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for the price. Very helpful customer support from the day of purchase. Very useful tips shared over email. As suggested users need to do 4-5 session of flying to get used to the controls and then try expecting more to avoid any mishappenings. Users manual received with product could be more detailed. Also wish this had camera moving downward and obstruction detection mechanism..but for that need to shell out more money and in this price it’s a best option available .waiting to take this in my next ourdoor trip to record some live action
customer_reviews.author: ABI

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Drone, Potensic D80
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome drone for the price. The features that it has are great. The handling characteristics are excellent. I've flown several patterns around my neighborhood and the video is very good.......links to your phone with a free app. To make it even better there was a $50 coupon available plus the company sent me an extra battery for free. It doesn't get any better than this. So if you're looking to upgrade to a more serious drone than a regular recreational one then this is what you need. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Hagood

customer_reviews.title: Get extra battery packs. Picture quality is really good.
customer_reviews.text: Got this drone for my husbands birthday. He loves it said it was the best gift I’ve ever gotten him. Really glad it came so quickly as the other things I ordered for him did not arrive in time for his birthday. Thank you. Only downfall is battery time is only about 16 mins so we need to invest in extra batteries so he can really enjoy it and take some nice videos.
customer_reviews.author: Kaulean Morningstar

customer_reviews.title: Battery will not charge after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: I am waiting for support to respond to my email concerns. Will change rating if support will replace battery/charging device. We tried drone 1 time and never let it leave the ground as we were simply looking for an understanding of how the drone and transmitter would work. Drone sat in it's beautiful case for 2 months until we had the nerve to try it again. Plugged battery in and the green light simply flashed for 8 hours and never when solid green. Put battery in to drone to see if it was charged and the transmitter showed no battery power in drone. Lights were dull green/yellow. This might be the most expensive battery I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Lost drone maybe
customer_reviews.text: Took it out it was pretty windy. Tried to see how high I could go and I lost control then a minute later it started to beeped. I lost video so I started hitting the home button and nothing I waited 5 mins and nothing i pretty much gave up. Then I realized I was hitting the wrong button for home so I actually hit the home button waited 5 more mins still nothing I put the controller away thinking it was gone and about 5 mins later I walk back outside to hear it hovering and landing where I launched it....
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice drone, but app is a little buggy. I contacted support and they we're quick to reply and very helpful. The drone is easy to fly and the auto return home is a nice feature. Only reason for not giving 5 star rating is because of the app, other than that it's a really nice drone for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: POTENSIC DRONE D80
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely just a great drone. The stability on this drone is off the charts. Well designed and sturdy made. I have not lost signal once with this drone even though have flown up to a 150 distance wise with altitude of 250ft. The FPV video never glitches out and I can change from either video recording too still shots while in flight without any interruptions with the signal or video. Also Potensic took great lengths to seen the nice case with the drone and you can even keep props on while you store it in the case. I may be purchasing another just for backup later on. Way to go Potensic!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thowell23

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This drone is awesome. This company is awesome. I’m a beginner at flying a drone. This drone is so easy to operate, flies exceptionally well and has great video. I dropped my controller two months after receiving my drone and it stopped functioning. Contacted Potensic customer service and inquired into purchasing a new controller. Told me they would send me a new one at no cost. Excellent customer service. When I get ready to purchase another drone Potensic will have my business.
customer_reviews.author: James Hughes

customer_reviews.title: My first drone.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Drone. The Drone works great. I discovered the cable is attached to the battery. My mistake.The built in functions on the drone are amazing. It does the hard stuff for you if you want it to. My manual landing attempts are very clunky at best. The auto landing is very elegant to watch. The auto return has saved my drone from the trees several times already, and I have only flown it 5 times. This is the perfect drone for a newbie who wants more than a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Man

customer_reviews.title: One of the best drones I have seen
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this as a gift for a friend but once we started using it he was forced to share it with me. Too much fun to allow him to keep it all to himself. The case it comes in is awesome too. We have had others that didn't have a case and ended up broke just from being knocked around. It is nice to be able to just grab the case and go instead of having to track down parts or batteries. The auto features on it are awesome. We get some really cool videos from the pre-program feature and the follow me is always fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Dann Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Drone
customer_reviews.text: This drone is my first drone and it is really easy to fly with great features. It includes a carrying case which is nice to carry all your gear back and forth to the park. It has about a 15 minute fly time if you are not full throttling the drone. Overall a great drone to start with if you are just getting into the hobby.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carley

customer_reviews.title: Camera doesn't work and it will.fly away
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 3 of these for work. I for primary, 1 as a backup and the 3rd for parts. 3 things happened on all 3. 1) The freaking camera stops working. It says its taking the picture, yet it doesn't show up. 2) This drone will just randomly take off sometimes when you initially go up. You have to hit the emergency stop and try to run and catch it. 3) The camera doesn't work. I had to include this twice. I bought these purely for pictures and it doesn't even work. Don't buy this if you need the pictures .
customer_reviews.author: Jamie whitley.

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Our drone took out and disappeared-we lost control of it at a very short distance
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second potensic drone. I upgraded to the D80 from the T25 for more flight time. Having it's own carrying case was a big plus. It is easy to operate and would recommend if your looking to purchase your first drone.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie B

customer_reviews.title: Needs a Gimbal camera to film good footage.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the drone, it was fast and response well. I had some issues with footage turning pink and connection at less then 200 yards. It’s great to learn how to fly, not great to film. The price was good .
customer_reviews.author: 1995Wrangler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect out of the box
customer_reviews.text: All functions work as advertised. Wifi pairing, controller and drone so far have been spot on. Update to this review. I had an issue with the drone and the customer service l received was second to none. I would highly recommend buying this drone from this company. Buy with confidence Love it
customer_reviews.author: b.i.

customer_reviews.title: This is the Drone you've been looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: The smile on my face says it all! This Drone is my first drone and I could not be more satisfied. All the bells and whistles for a good price. Didn't get the video to work first time out. Guess its time to read the manual. Still super easy to use and set up. GPS Auto return alone makes this a great learners drone. Loose visual and can't see the drone, one button brings it back. If this drone is within your budget it's a must have! What are you waiting for?
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: Best Drone I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This drone exceeded my expectations for the price. (Got it for 199 lightening deal). All the features work exactly as advertised. The follow and home works great. The GPS functionality is spot on. Just make sure you have the recommended number of signals! The video quality is fantastic. What a great product. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Best Drone I have owned!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Potensic D80 GPS drone. It is built well, with no assembly required and very easy to operate. What makes it truly easy to use are the single button takeoff and home button. The photos and video are stunningly clear. This drone is really simple to land as well, by pressing the home button. Another cool feature is the “Follow Me” mode which uses the GPS to find wherever you go. One knock would be the 5-hour charge time for a 15-minute fly time and hence an extra battery is a must. I’m very happy with the purchase and definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Farhad Hyder

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Drone—Tony Taylor
customer_reviews.text: I Like the easy set-up instructions and the easy to use remote control. There are no real major dislike at this time. I thought the battery for the Drone was already charged when I opened the box but it was not. Delayed calibrating the Drone when I got it. One thing I don’t like is when you remove the battery from the air craft, you have to re calibrate the air craft. The Drone case is very nice. It help keeps the Drone safe and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great to fly, just fun
customer_reviews.text: I have been flying RC airplanes and helicopters for many years and have avoided quadcopters but this has changed my mind! The entire system is very easy to use, the quad is very stable and full of functions to keep you out of trouble. The GPS functions can be very handy, you can restrict distance and altitude on the controller. Love it and will be flying it as often as weather permits!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Moore

customer_reviews.title: Range much less than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nice drone and fun to operate but their range numbers don’t measure up to what I’ve seen. I’ve been in an area that is wide open with zero signal interference and on average I lose stick control at 220 meters max and I lose video on the app well before that. So I verify it to 700’ range. I’ve emailed support multiple times with no reply, I just consider the source and enjoy it within its limits. I will say this, every single time I’ve lost control of the sticks, the Home button has brought the thing back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Fading Footsteps

customer_reviews.title: Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: The product is under review. I recently bought this drone that comes in a awesome case. Easy to use and you must calibrate the drone to fly. I had an issue with the one I got so I emailed customer service and they sent me a replacement. One thing I wish is that for the ability to contact customer support by phone. Great drone for the money.
customer_reviews.author: T.R. Dugger

customer_reviews.title: Xmas drone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this drone as an Xmas gift for my 12 year old son. Great price for a beginner drone. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Zumi

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT DRONE FOR BEGINERS AT NOT HIGH COST.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and fly, my son and I enjoy too much at our local park. I would recommend at least 1 extra battery and a micro SD card of 32GB maximum capacity. I try to use a 64GB and I got an error when try to record video.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Flores

customer_reviews.title: First drone
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase, still trying to get used to it being that I’m a first time drone owner, camera quality is great, I would highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and fun to fly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to control, easy to learn, great camera and fun to fly around on a nice sunny day! I enjoy the sense of control you get when flying it around. Turns on a dime and the attitude control is a plus for beginners! The only down side is the camera is fixed at an angle so if you fly to far your image might be out of camera angle quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ian B.

customer_reviews.title: Potensic-M80
customer_reviews.text: I felt the product was great very easy to fly and get going right from the start also it flys well in moderate wind. Great product for price. I was only disappointed that it came with only one batter also the charging port on the battery needs to be upgraded it should not have that type of connection and remote could use an upgrade but all in all great drone for the price and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cocciardi Jr

customer_reviews.title: Wow what an amazing product !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this drone, and so do our grandkids. I was extremely surprised at the ease of use and how well this drone runs. I do need to invest in extra batteries. By the time our grandkids get to watch it operate for the full length of one battery charge, they’re generally ready to come up with new flight paths in the countryside where we use it safely as instructed by the manufacturer and laws in our state.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wells

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions and get an extra battery.
customer_reviews.text: The drone is very easy to use but you need to follow instructions. The return to home feature works like a charm, but you need to be prepared. It will first go up to altitude, hover for a minute and then return to home. Would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Read all instructions a couple of times before flying.
customer_reviews.text: This drone is fantastic. Fairly new to flying and have others but this drone is far better and so easy to fly. Does everything listed on the box and the return home is a great feature. You can actually take your hands off the the sticks to change items on the phone and the drone stays in place. With this one you get your monies worth.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great Drone!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an anniversary gift for my husband and he loves it. He said it was easy to set up, use and the quality of the videos/pictures are pretty clear. I would definitely recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Messado

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup, awesome control
customer_reviews.text: This drone is simply fantastic. Never owned a drone and never flown one. Comes in a great case that securely holds the drone, remote, and all accessories. Setting it up for flight within remote paring, and wireless connection to phone and app was super easy and intuitive. Outside, the drone has awesome gps feature- great for navigation control and return to home feature. Easily get 20 minutes out of the battery, and I bought an extra so lots of flying time. Highly recommended as the flight is fantastic and the video and pictures taken are really great and easily transferred to your library from the app.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Practice before u even fly it.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it's looks and design but to be honest with you it's not for the beginner drone pilot you'll need some practice with a less powerful drone before you take her up into the sky.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonlove

customer_reviews.title: First time drone flyer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever experience with a drone so I don't have anything to compare the experience to, but based on my first flight, this drone is going to be a lot of fun! I didn't push the envelope too much on my first flight, just wanted to get comfortable with the flight characteristics. I was very pleased with the responsiveness, controllability, and range and thought the return home feature worked great. All in all, I'm very pleased with the purchase and looking forward to many fun flights.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Fuerst

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone at this price
customer_reviews.text: This drone is super easy for beginners, easy to fly and very stable.that’s wonderful gift for my husband.he loves to play with this drone. Nice images from camera. You can see the video he took .looks great
customer_reviews.author: Jenny huang

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and affordable price for a drone packed with options.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had a chance to fly yet but did test it’s functionality as best I could without flying, judging by the other reviews I’m not expecting any problems, the 5 stars are because of how fast I received order.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Filius

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The follow me feature malfunctioned and the company is replacing it for me. This drone is wonderful. Be careful about using follow me mode in cities but otherwise it’s super durable I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kneeland

customer_reviews.title: Drone power at its best
customer_reviews.text: This drone performs better than more expensive machines. The remote is easy to learn and easy to use. Whether you use it recreationally or commercially, this Potensic drone will do most of what you what and need to do. I definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great Drone!
customer_reviews.text: Received the upgraded D80. I test flew it and tested all the features and it preformed well so far.I am happy with it! I do have to say that i was impressed with the drone! The customer service I have gotten from this company has been outstanding they stand behind their products still very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: T&T

customer_reviews.title: A must-have if you're going to start learning to fly a drone very easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: This was a very easy to fly drone right out of the case charge the battery and everything is ready to go great for someone who is just starting to learn I was very nervous on my first lift off and was put at ease after I had time to work with it worked and performed as described exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Just what i wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Just what i was looking for. Easy to control, picture quality is nice. Range is exceptional, I recommend buying a few more batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Ec

customer_reviews.title: Drone flys smoothly, don't panic, just release the sticks and it stops and hovers!
customer_reviews.text: Being a older man I wasn't sure I could learn how to fly the drone. It didn't take me ten minutes and I was confidently flying and landing the drone where ever I wanted it to go. The Drone-X app I downloaded to my cell phone works great! Great drone for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P Sr.

customer_reviews.title: I like the drone
customer_reviews.text: Take a bit to get used to the controls and have to make sure takeoff is flat. Good range and control. I really like it
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Bilicki

customer_reviews.title: My Dad loves his!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for Christmas, and he loves it! He's been bragging about it to all of his friends, and he's been out there flying it at every opportunity. He's still learning how to control it, but he's getting better every time. The D80 seems perfect for beginners (which my dad is), but it's still got a lot of the features that he wanted in a drone. He's like a little kid again. I'd say more, but he hasn't let me fly it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Potensic did give me the help that was required and met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product when it it working properly. Potensic did give me the help that was required and met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best drone for quality and features at this price point, easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Got the D80 for learning how to fly drones to take videos from altitude, purely for fun. First time out I went with an experienced pilot; however, I found that flying this drone is easy. Importantly it has a fly/land, and come home button which eliminates difficult take off and landings. Video quality is excellent and drone is quiet and has quality construction. Order spare batteries as flight time is short.
customer_reviews.author: Toni L.

customer_reviews.title: It looks cool.
customer_reviews.text: This UAV is very beautiful, the signal can fly very far, the seller's gift department also promised to give me a battery! It's perfect to fly for half an hour! You can go out and take pictures. Connect the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jovy H

customer_reviews.title: FUN BUT HARD
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little while to get use to flying, this is my first drone. the return to home is very cool when u cant see it anymore. i use and iphone X and the photos and video capture if very good. Get a couple of batteries cause as soon as u get the hang of flying the remote wil start beeping so a couple of extra batteries is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: D80 drone.
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy as it says to fly it. There is no way to shut if off when it hits something , the motors keep turning . Could not get it to work on my iPhone 7plus. Flew it three times and the battery fell out twice , the battery was locked but still came out . Would not recommend it to anyone that never flown one.
customer_reviews.author: Carmel J. Nadeau

product_meta.title: Potensic D80 Drone with Camera for Adults, GPS Drone with 2K FHD Camera, Brushless Motor Quadcopter, Auto Return Home, Follow Me, 20Min Flight Time, 25 mph High Speed, Includes Aluminum Carrying Case-
feature_bullets: [5G WiFi 2K FPV CAMERA] - Upgraded 2K with 5G WIFI design to captured more smooth, cinematic HD video you've expected with fast transmission. Note: 2K content requires a 16/32 GB SD card(Card not included).

[POWERFUL BRUSHLESS MOTORS] - Compare to other drones, this D80 GPS drone adopts the advanced 4 brushless motors to ensure stable flight at high speed(40km/h at most) and long-distance(up to 500-1000m) with low consumption. It may not suitable for kids under 14 but ideal drones for adults.

[MULTIFUNCTION AND MUCH FUN] -Equipped with functions like Auto Return, FPV, One Key Take Off/Landing, Altitude Hold, Follow Me and Tap Fly, perfect drone to catch your surfing, skating, parkour and other exciting moment.

[DUAL GPS NEVER LOST] - Integrates the latest technology with dual GPS to keep accurate positioning detail of your drone. The Return-to-Home function enables this camera drone automatically return when battery low/ signal weak/ out of range. No worry about the lost.
[MORE ENJOYMENT AND BETTER PROTECT] - Come with 1800mAh batteries& elegant aluminum case to extend your playtime up to 20 minutes and better protect this Potensic D80 drone.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars465 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
